name: File chooser
description: Allow a user to pick a file from their device, and access the chosen file.

conditions.name: On changed
conditions.description: Triggered when a file selection is made.

actions.name: Release file
actions.description: Release a file so it is no longer using memory.

params.name: File URL
params.description: The URL of the file to release.

actions.name: Click
actions.description: Activate the file picker as if the file chooser button was clicked. Note this may only work in a user input trigger.

actions.name: Clear
actions.description: Clear any existing file selection from the file picker, restoring it to its initial state.

expressions.name: FileNameAt
expressions.description: Name of chosen file at an index.

expressions.name: FileSizeAt
expressions.description: Size of chosen file at an index.

expressions.name: FileTypeAt
expressions.description: MIME type of chosen file at an index.

expressions.name: FileURLAt
expressions.description: A URL to access the data of the chosen file at an index.
